title: Issues with notification led on pixel 2 XL
content:
Hi there I have purchased a brand new pixel 2 XL and it seems there are some malfunction on the led notification.
First I don't know when exactly should blink the notification led (I mean , it blinks with a new outlook mail / whatsapp / lost call?)
Second, the few times I saw the notification led works it only blinks once and that's all, the led didn't blinks again.
Is this the actual way the notification led works or is there a malfunction?
Thanks in advance
